channel.title: Faithful subjects of moparscape i need help
channel.description:
hey im making my server (new 1) jsut need help on the following
1) how i make it so u need lvl 99 in skill to weild skillcapes??
2)can some1 give me codes for: 2a) ::ipban 2b) ::mute
(plz be very detailed as possible as im kinda new to this (tell me whre exactly to add add how to add)
